segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, apron on, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window behind her frames a lovely garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the faucet's on, and water's spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, one foot in the growing puddleâ€”silly her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy climbing the stool for cookies makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched up, grabbing those treats so boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles, but he's got it under control, I think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up for her share is just adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for a secret snack time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink adds a bit of harmless excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby wait their turn to be dried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene is full of little joys despite the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
